title: Ticket #3764: Add support for wildcards in VALID_SPOOL_FILES
description:
Currently, wildcards are not supported, which has never been a problem before, but if your SPOOL directory is mounted on NFS, it's possible that .nfsXXXXXX lock files may exist there(*) which causes the condor_preen daemon to complain when it can't remove them (and it probably shouldn't if it could!)

(*) why they exist there is beyond me, and should probably be investigated.
check_ins:
2013-Aug-08 12:07   Check-in [37129]: doc for updated VALID_SPOOL_FILES, which now accepts a * in a file name. Added version history item about this change. ===GT=== #3764 (By Karen Miller )
2013-Jul-10 17:57   Check-in [36857]: add wildcard support for VALID_SPOOL_FILES, #3764 (By Zach Miller )
creator: zmiller
